attributes.action: Stop infringing the civil liberties of native English, Welsh, Scots and Irish to counter immigrant terror
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are seeing the imposition of ID cards, extensions to police powers to stop and search whilst letting suspected enemies of the state go free.  Please review why natives of this country should suffer curtailment of their freedom in the name of politically correct immigration policies.  We dont need ID cards, we need sensible border controls. Stop the sale of citizenship through arranged marriages, deport alien terrorists.  Why protect the human rights of those who plan to kill our servicemen abroad??
